Having come through the bruising browser wars, I didn't want to do that again. So Sergey Brin and Larry Page hired some ex-Firefox developers and had them build a prototype. Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a Ben Wallace win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us. I think a game like this is going to help us down the road.'' Elias Says Allen Iverson
